result.title: The intermediate Super KVM - Fast virtual I/O hypervisor
result.description: The deliverable consists of the source code and packages to be used for installation of the sKVM. It is provided in yearly iterations throughout the projectâ€™s lifetime. It adds the co-tenancy related security concepts and their implementations, to be fed into T3.1. It also describes and provides the components for the integration between the sKVM and OSv, targeting multi-facet speed-up of the system.
